doc.title: Con Trek
doc.plot: Con Trek features two hosts delving deeper into the world of fandom conventions than anyone has ever gone before! Go along with Alan and Brittney as they meet celebrities, attendees in costumes that must be seen to be believed, and participate in once in a lifetime events that up until now, only convention goers have been lucky enough to experience. If you're a fan of anime, sci-fi TV and movies, fantasy, horror, gaming, comic books, and anything else fandom related, this is the series for you. Whether its crazy wrestling anime bands, super heroes, scantily clad fairies, or celebrities of TV and film, it's all here on Con Trek!
